channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly posting in Minster Churchyard, 29th September
item.description:
This is a Heritage Site!! The flyposters are advertising an event at 14 Regent Street Cheltenham GL50 1HE. This is illegal and the perpetrators should be fined.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chester Walk, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hidden hole in ground covered in leaves, 29th September
item.description:
There is a hole in the ground here. I didn't see it as it was covered in leaves. I stumbled into it and have hurt my back. This park has several similar holes that people get caught out with.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chestnut Walk, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
